segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures a moment of everyday life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is absorbed in drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress make her look so homemaker-like.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the garden path with bushes is inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But look at the sinkâ€”water is overflowing uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The drain must be clogged; it's not going down at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming, and she's right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are raiding the cookie jar on the sly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool, reaching in with one hand, plate in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are spreading out; it's unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl below, arm up, expecting her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're cooperating so cutely, but it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of worry for their safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This obliviousness to danger is heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidy outside world contrasts sharply with this interior hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR
